snippet: Brady, 38, has often redone his contract to help the Patriots’ salary-cap situation, and a deal could significantly lessen his $15 million hit for 2016....
lead_paragraph: Brady, 38, has often redone his contract to help the Patriots’ salary-cap situation, and a deal could significantly lessen his $15 million hit for 2016.

headline.main: Patriots’ Tom Brady Reportedly Agrees to 2-Year Extension
headline.print_headline: Reports: Tom Brady Agrees to 2-Year Extension
